pullRequest.title: Added Reference Links
pullRequest.bodyText: These reference links in the document helps in redirecting to the different pages. Instead of searching each section.

commit.message:
Added Reference Links

These reference links in the document helps in redirecting to the different pages. Instead of searching each section.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -8,10 +8,10 @@ Building it yourself.
 Then come back here and you might want to read the following
 documentation before continuing:
 
-* Longer Getting Started Guide

-* Review the Architecture guide to see how to build Routes using the xref:java-dsl.adoc[Java DSL]

commit.message:
Update docs/user-manual/modules/ROOT/pages/getting-started.adoc

Thanks for the suggestions. Going forward we will take care.

Co-Authored-By: Zoran Regvart <zoran@regvart.com>
